messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] For Lyle
messages.msgSnippet: Well...gee...ummmm...I don t know what to say!  (I m not used to being left speechless, lol.) Thank you, Kathleen.  What a nice thing to say.  I don t usually
messages.messageBody:
Well...gee...ummmm...I don't know what to say! (I'm not used to being left speechless, lol.)

Thank you, Kathleen. What a nice thing to say. I don't usually find myself very inspiring, but it's nice to know that someone does. Thank you.

Scattagories....now there's a game we haven't played in a while. Maybe I'll suggest that tonight.

See! You're inspiring me too!

:)

Lyle


----- Original Message -----
From: "gehrkes" <gehrkes@...>
Date: Mon, 19 Jan 2004 14:23:18 -0000
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] For Lyle

> Lyle,
> I read something somewhere about you wanting to be a writer. Your
> posts are always inspiration to me and often my hubby.So last night
> when we were playing Scattagories we needed an authors name. It
> needed to start with L.. And you were it.I did not have time to
> access my full brain and your name was the one out in front for me.
> No one even questioned my answer at all.. SO FYI besides being a
> inspiring poster you are a recognized author..
> Kathleen
>



***Always remember, Lead By Example***

--

messages.subject: For Lyle
messages.msgSnippet: Lyle, I read something somewhere about you wanting to be a writer. Your posts are always inspiration to me and often my hubby.So last night when we were
messages.messageBody:
Lyle,
I read something somewhere about you wanting to be a writer. Your
posts are always inspiration to me and often my hubby.So last night
when we were playing Scattagories we needed an authors name. It
needed to start with L.. And you were it.I did not have time to
access my full brain and your name was the one out in front for me.
No one even questioned my answer at all.. SO FYI besides being a
inspiring poster you are a recognized author..
Kathleen
